description: Details required by Condition 11 (SuDs statement and calculations) of Planning Permission 20/00944/FUL (Application under Section 73A to vary condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission ref: 19/02823/FUL (Application under Section 73 to vary condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission 19/01820/FUL (Erection of 1 x 6 bedroom two storey house with rooms in roof and basement and single storey detached garage) to enable the enlargement of basement to incorporate a swimming pool)
decision_conditions: Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 11 (SuDs statement and calculations) of planning permission 20/00944/FUL the applicant has not demonstrated on balance that the details of the implementation, adoption, maintenance and management of a sustainable drainage system would prevent the increased risk of flooding in accordance with Policy CS1 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Condition 7 (Construction Management Plan) of planning permission 22/00208/HOU is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

Site Location Plan - the submitted Site Location Plan does not fully meet the criteria as set out below. The red line must also include the pavement to the front of the property as this is where the proposed work will take place.Note: A Site Location Plan must be at a scale of either 1:1250 or 1:2500 which identifies the site and the surrounding area and shows at least two roads and the north point. The site should be outlined in red and any other land owned by the applicant in blue. It should include land necessary to carry out the proposed development (e.g. land required for access to the site from a public highway, visibility splays, car parking and open areas around buildings).
